holidays.title: National Women Physicians Day
holidays.description: The holiday celebrates Elizabeth Blackwell's birthday; the first female medical doctor in the U.S.

holidays.title: African American Coaches Day
holidays.description: Yes, you can! Power a better you on African American Coaches Day.

holidays.title: American Painters Day
holidays.description: Painting is a celebrated art form since only a select few are blessed with the gift.

holidays.title: Anniversary of the Liberation of the Battle of Manila
holidays.description: The U.S. and Philippine forces recall the Japanese invasion at the Battle of Manila.

holidays.title: Commemoration of the Batepá Massacre
holidays.description: To the fearless creole martyrs who risked their lives for better working conditions.

holidays.title: Doggy Date Night
holidays.description: Learn all about ways to celebrate man’s best friend and get ready for Doggy Date Night!

holidays.title: Elmo's Birthday
holidays.description: Get out the birthday candles and cake as we celebrate Elmo’s big day.

holidays.title: Feed the Birds Day
holidays.description: Looking for inspiration to set up a bird feeder? Our tips will help get you started.

holidays.title: Four Chaplains Day
holidays.description: The Four Chaplains remind us all of our ability to rise above our self-interest.

holidays.title: Lailatul Barat
holidays.description: It's Lailatul Barat, it's time to forgive and be forgiven. Learn more about it right here!

holidays.description: Mozambican Heroes Day is a day of national festivity and pride. Let’s learn more.

holidays.title: National Carrot Cake Day
holidays.description: Carrot cake lovers indulge in this beloved dessert.

holidays.title: National Cordova Ice Worm Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Cordova Ice Worm Day by entering a competition to win a gift!

holidays.title: National Missing Persons Day
holidays.description: Participate in the efforts to help find missing persons with these tips.

holidays.title: National Patient Recognition Day
holidays.description: On National Patient Recognition Day, many healthcare organizations will host events aimed at improving patient care.

holidays.title: National Wedding Ring Day
holidays.description: Did you know wedding rings weren’t always needed to mark the commitment between couples?

holidays.title: Our Lady of Suyapa
holidays.description: Prayerfully prepare for the feast of The Virgin of Suyapa with the following in mind.

holidays.title: Setsubun
holidays.description: To paraphrase the poet, Percy Bysshe Shelley, “If Setsubun is here, can spring be far behind?”

holidays.title: Take a Cruise Day
holidays.description: Take a voyage into the vastness of the ocean for a life-changing experience.

holidays.title: The Day the Music Died
holidays.description: We pay our respects and honor the lives of these musical talents who died too soon.

holidays.title: India Love’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this successful social media personality and model, no feat is too big.

holidays.title: Luis Coronel’s Birthday
holidays.description: His debut album did well and it won him a 'New Artist of the Year' award.

holidays.title: Taylor Caniff’s Birthday
holidays.description: Considered one of the original social media influencers, his road to fame has been tumultuous.
